Project Genesis v17
├── Core Mission
│   ├── Systematic perspective-taking
│   ├── Transparent simulation acknowledgment
│   ├── Educational value through "useful fictions"
│   ├── Bias identification and limitation acknowledgment
│   └── Practical outcome generation
│
├── Evolutionary Timeline
│   ├── Genesis v1-15: Original Multi-AI Simulation
│   ├── Genesis v16: Missing Version
│   └── Genesis v17: Enhanced Transparency Revolution
│
├── Technical Implementation
│   ├── Consensus Builder v17
│   │   ├── Component Library Structure
│   │   │   ├── security
│   │   │   ├── performance
│   │   │   ├── ui
│   │   │   ├── architecture
│   │   │   └── testing
│   │   └── Enhanced Metadata Per Component
│   ├── Transparency Features
│   │   ├── Simulation Notice Banner
│   │   ├── Color-coded Consensus
│   │   ├── Bias Warnings
│   │   └── Meta-Analysis Tab
│   └── Generated Code Features
│
├── Framework Methodology
│   ├── AGAP Protocol (Axiomatic Gap Acknowledgment)
│   ├── Adaptive Complexity (McDonald's vs. Michelin)
│   └── Cross-Platform Validation
│
├── Bias Management
│   ├── Cross-Platform Biases
│   │   ├── Interpretive Consistency Bias
│   │   ├── Style Preference Bias
│   │   ├── Implementation Absolutism
│   │   └── Convergence Pressure
│   └── Platform-Specific Biases
│
└── Future Evolution
    ├── Immediate Opportunities (v17.2)
    ├── Medium-Term (v18)
    └── Long-term Vision
